quest.name: The Measure of His Reach
journal: Raubahn has a personal favor to ask of you.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have asked Urianger to look after Krile. He will keep her out of harm's way. Though, after what she has endured, her physical well-being may be the least of our worries...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Worry not for her safety. Look thee to the east.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Right, then. I must go to my men. I shall be leading the first charge through the breach.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Then we shall head to the front.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Pipin has command of our artillery outside the gate. He'll not be hard to find.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Ah, but before you go, I have a final favor to ask.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Give this to my son. He will understand.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: There's no need for explanations. When he sees it, he will know.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: 'Twould seem our position here is secure...

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Forename[GC Rank], Alphinaud. Hm? What is that you've got there?

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: By the Twelve, this is...this is Tizona!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The Bull of Ala Mhigo's legendary sword, forged from two cursed blades...

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: This sword is a symbol of everything my father fought to achieve. A weapon claimed on the bloodsands, and with it fortune and glory. Its flames consume the unworthy, but by fire was he reborn.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text:
That he should bequeath it to me now...to carry on his legacy...
Well, I shall endeavor to deserve it. But I'll be damned if this is his final battle!

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Once we begin, there will be no respite until it's over. Are you ready, my friends?

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Very well. Brace yourselves. This should be quite a specta─

dialogue.name: FLAMEHERALD
dialogue.text: Vice Marshal! Vice Marshal! Imperial unit approaching from the north!

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Aiming to destroy our artillery, are they? How many?

dialogue.name: FLAMEHERALD
dialogue.text: Total numbers unconfirmed. At least one squadron. But sir─they're wolfmen!

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Ferae Domitae. Bloody hells, that's all we need. Call up the Bloodsworn. Tell them to make ready─

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Marshal Tarupin, wait!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: These “wolfmen” of whom you speak hail from Doma. They were coerced into fighting for the Empire─spirited away to a foreign land and told that if they disobeyed, the lives of their kin would be forfeit.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: But their homeland has been liberated. They have no reason to continue serving their imperial masters!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ere you engage them in battle, I beseech you: grant us a moment to go and attempt to convince them to lay down their arms!

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: I am loath to gift our enemy more time to prepare...but if there is a chance that this conflict might be avoided, I suppose we must take it. Go then─but be quick.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We will, Vice Marshal.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: With me, Forename!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I dream of a day when people accept my words as truth without demanding that I prove them through feats of strength. But come, we must away.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Our scouts report that the wolfmen are advancing on our position from the north of the city. Convince them to retreat, or we will have no choice but to engage.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We will wait here for the Lupin to arrive. Steel yourself, my friend. Though I hope to resolve this without resorting to violence, it would seem wise to prepare for the worst...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: They come, Forename!

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: (-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)You! Clear the road!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Honorable warriors of Doma! My name is Alphinaud Leveilleur, and I come before you with news of great import─

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: (-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Silence, boy! You stand upon a battlefield. Begone, or be cut down!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Doma is free! Lord Hien has returned and driven Yotsuyu and the imperials from your lands! We were there─we helped him! There is no need for you to fight for Zenos!

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: (-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Lord Hien is dead, and you are a liar! What could a boy such as you do against magitek? Throw stones and spit curses!?

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: (-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Invoke my lord's name again at your peril. We will suffer no falsehoods!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I speak only the truth! Put up your weapons, I beg of you! Let us speak as friends and not shed blood in vain!

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: (-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)If your claims were true, we would gladly sheathe our blades and embrace as brothers.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: (-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)But since they must surely be false, we would be traitors to accept! Our lives and those of our loved ones, forfeit!

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: (-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Words are air! You will prove the truth of your tale on the battlefield, or die in dishonor!

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: (-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)You are no strangers to battle, that much is plain...

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: I am the White. I am Hakuro! And I will be your opponent! Have at you!

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: You fought with honor and restraint. You could have killed my men, and perhaps even me...but you did not. For this, I thank you.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: Warriors brave and true. I pray you tell us of the battle for Doma's liberation.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We should be glad to do so...

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: ...Lord Hien, returned! Such joy this news brings us.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: But for Lord Gosetsu to perish in the keep's collapse...to be taken from us by such treachery... There is no justice...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Eyes forward, Hakuro. He wished for no better death.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: You knew him well. Aye, he would not suffer us to mourn with so much undone. And so we will not. Duty comes before all.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: But I knew the man, and he would not suffer us to mourn on the eve of this great battle. Duty comes before all.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: All Lupin shall know of Doma's liberation, and of your part in it.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: When you breach the gates, we shall turn on the imperials as one. With fang and claw shall we rip open the throats of our masters. This the White swears.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Thank you. When our war is ended, I am certain that your lord will help us to return you all to Doma.

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: Such a curious thing, destiny, to see us meet with friends of Lord Hien in this distant corner of the world. But we shall not keep you─your day is not yet done.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Come, let us not keep our comrades waiting. We have a nation to liberate!

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Impeccable timing, those Domans! Come, comrades! The enemy's gate is down! Forward!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: You do not think he would actually wait until the last... No, no. Of course not. He's no Vidofnir.

dialogue.name: AYMERIC
dialogue.text: By the Fury... Did that man just bring down flying armor with a single stroke in midair?

dialogue.name: LUCIA
dialogue.text: The vice marshal's strategy for breaching the gates was most ingenious. A pity he did not account for the magitek armor─but to be fair, they did not account for the Domans either.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: If you find Zenos, you kill him. No hesitation. Others may be taken prisoner, but not him. Not under any circumstances.

dialogue.name: WOLFMAN
dialogue.text: If you die this day, then we shall know you for liars!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Truly...? Must we fight to prove that we need not fight!?

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: Until I am satisfied, we shall fight on! Give me your all!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: On your guard! His strength far exceeds that of his brethren!

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text:
Hah! You have faced a samurai of Doma before!
But I may yet surprise you...

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: Is that all you can muster, Eorzeans!? Hold naught back!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Such ferocity...! If he does not relent, we shall be forced to kill him!

dialogue.name: HAKURO
dialogue.text: Enough. You are every bit the warriors you claim to be.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Confound it...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...So be it. Moonstone Carbuncle! Come!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text:
Stand within the Carbuncle's wards!
They will grant you strength!
